price: Your Lord would never destroy the towns unjustly while their people were acting righteously.
arabic: وَمَا كَانَ رَبُّكَ لِيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ بِظُلۡمٖ وَأَهۡلُهَا مُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
